name: Best Res. ASHP, Env., PC (EE+DF–FS) CC

market_entry_year_source.notes: Assume historical penetration is captured in baseline

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Sales-weighted average electric central cooling/heating efficiency in 2021 based on AEO 2020 microtables and EIA equipment efficiencies doc

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies – Appendix A – Electric Furnaces, CAC, ASHP, GSHP
EIA AEO 2020 Residential Microtables – Sales Tab 'DetailedEquipTable', Year 2021

installed_cost_source.notes: Total installed cost is average of low/high 'ESTAR Connected Thermostat' values plus installed costs for best ASHP in 2020; attribute cost to heating unit replacement, with no cost for associated cooling capabilities; for existing buildings, added service costs of $1K for natural gas and $2K for distillate/other assigned based on EIA report

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies
Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies
Grid-Interactive Efficient Building Technology Cost, Performance, and Lifetime Characteristics
source_data.author: Nubbe et al. 2020

source_data.title: Residential End Uses: Area 2: Incremental Installed Costs for Efficiency Upgrades

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average of low & high values for 'Average Life (yrs.)'

source_data.title: Grid-Interactive Efficient Building Technology Cost, Performance, and Lifetime Characteristics
source_data.author: Nubbe et al. 2020

market_scaling_fractions_source.heating: Applies to all residential fuel-fired heating; no electric heating is switched by this ECM

cooling.title: RECS 2015 Microdata
cooling.fraction_derivation: Central AC multiple of 59.5% was determined as a proportion of total homes with a ducted cooling system where heating is done using any non-electric heating energy source. Total homes with ducted cooling in the sample is 76,090,522, and then filtered for homes with fuel-fired heating system (45,241,958).

market_scaling_fractions_source.secondary heating: Applies to all residential fuel-fired heating; no electric heating is switched by this ECM

_description: Switch to best available ASHP with smart thermostat controls for preconditioning, cold-climate
